ygData.subject: Re: Here we go!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, space sickness, said Fliq, I used to get that. But I ve been travelling across space my whole life, except now of cousre, since I joined the Neo Beast

"Ah, space sickness," said Fliq, "I used to get that. But I've been 
travelling across space my whole life, except now of cousre, since I 
joined the Neo Beast Wars. You'll get used to it. Infact, the ship 
were going to is my old ship. We were coming here with re-
inforcements for the Maximals. Cybertron thought that they only 
needed us, and than the maximals would win the war. there was 10 of 
us. We had been a crew for the last 5 years. And than, as we were 
making our approach....," Fliq went silent, and that sucked up his 
chest as he continued, "The engines and alignement went out. We're 
actually lucky the moon was there. If it wasn'y, we would've been 
drifitng in around the universe, going at a speed so fast that rescue 
was impossible. We spun out and crashed against. We hit engines 
first, and combine that with the anti-matter problem in the engines, 
it caused a huge explosion that killed all 5 engine workers. That 
left myself, captain Brix, the navigation bot Gekkidama, the doctor 
Salit, and the security officer Bizrope. Brix Gekkidama and I were on 
the bridge, so we were the farthest away from the explosion. The 
three of us went and found Bizrope, and than headed down to the lab 
to get Salit. We had found him, and were about to head to the pods 
when a smaller explosion occured, this time in the engine closer to 
the lab, and it caused a container to break, filled with energon. The 
energon landed right on the doctor, and started filling him up with 
energy. Bizrope went up to help, but the energy overload caused Salit 
to explode. Bixrope was so close it killed him too. The three of us 
knew no one could have survived the engine explosions, so we 
continued down to the pods. Just before we got there, something 
happened. We had landed on a large crator, and was leading to one 
side of it. the weight was so much that that side of it collapsed and 
the ship went completly on an angle. This caused a huge exhaust tube 
to fall on Gekkidama's head. We didn't have time to check if he was 
alive or dead; we didn't know what was going to happen next. We 
rushed down to the pods and only one was functional. Theye ngine 
explosion and shook them alot, and the circuts were fried. Brix told 
me to use it. SO I went down to earth. Brix used some spare parts 
from the ship to make a pod, and than he came down. So there you have 
it. We're the only survivors of that crash. But on the plus side, the 
only things we can't really take are the engines, any medical 
equipement and the hull on one side of the ship. We can still take 
weapons and other hull pieces and new computer boards and...hey! I 
just got an idea. You know pods and stuff, so you can answer this. If 
we took like the bodies of Salit, Bizrope and Gekkida; the guys from 
the engines are probably beynond repair but anyway; we take the 
bodies back, repair them, and than chanel a spark back into them? I 
don't know if it's true, but I heard that Rhinox did it to Optimus in 
the original Beast Wars. I this ture?
